content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Greetings, Mr. Trabelsi. It's a pleasure to meet you. As a landlord, I want to ensure that I get the best possible rental price for my apartment. May I ask what you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am a student, so I don't have a lot of money to spend. I am dependable and responsible, so I am sure I will pay rent on time. I would like to negotiate the rental price. What do you propose?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: As a landlord, I understand your concerns about affordability. However, I am also looking to maximize my gains. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I propose a rental price of €800 per month. This price takes into account the costs of utilities and other expenses associated with the apartment. If you find this price acceptable, I can agree to it. If not, we can continue to negotiate to find a rental price that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your concerns, but I am looking for a lower rental price. I am willing to negotiate. Can we agree on €700 per month?

If not, I am open to discussing other options. For example, could I pay rent in advance for six months, and you would lower the monthly rent accordingly?

Or, could I pay rent in monthly installments of €650, and you would allow me to keep a small deposit of €500 to cover any potential damages or unpaid rent?

I am flexible and willing to explore other options to make the rental price more affordable for me.

If you are not willing to negotiate further, I will have to look for other options.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Mr. Trabelsi. While I do want to maximize my gains as a landlord, I also value your reliability and responsibility as a potential tenant. I am willing to consider your suggestions.

Regarding your first option, I can agree to a rental price of €700 per month. However, I would need to see some form of proof of your financial stability and ability to pay rent on time. If you can provide this, I can agree to the rental price.

Regarding your second option, I can agree to allow you to pay rent in advance for six months, with the monthly rent reduced to €650. However, I would need to see a security deposit of at least €500 to cover any potential damages or unpaid rent.

Regarding your third option, I can agree to allow you to pay rent in monthly installments of €650, with a small deposit of €500 to cover any potential damages or unpaid rent. However, I would need to see proof of your financial stability and ability to pay rent on time.

If you are willing to agree to one of these options, I can agree to the rental price. If not, I will have to consider other options. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Heinrich Heine
